description: This file defines a React functional component called 'Layout' that provides the main structural layout for a web application, including a top app bar, sidebar navigation, and a content area. It manages theme toggling, navigation, and user profile display.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: A function to switch the theme between 'light' and 'dark'.

methods.name: Layout({ children, theme, setTheme, user, onLogout })

ctags.name: Layout
ctags.pattern: /^function Layout({ children, theme, setTheme, user, onLogout }) {$/
